items.title: Free online in 1 minute
text: Information about the reliability of the counterparty, the selection of potential suppliers, the history of participation in procurements, the report on registration on the ETP

items.title: Any other questions?
text:
For consultation, contact the manager: org223@tektorg.ru,
or +7 495 734-81-18 ext. 515

example3.title:
Selection of suppliers for purchase.

A report with a list of suppliers for a specific purchase, selected in accordance with the specified parameters:
items: Is included in the RNP or not.

Belonging to an SME.

The report also contains information about the number of supplier's participation in purchases and its victories.

example4.title: Verification of registration on the ETP TEK-Torg:
items: A personal report with information about the registration of the suppliers you are interested in.
This report is useful in cases when it is necessary to quickly obtain data on the registration of suppliers on the ETP TEK-Torg.

example5.title:
History of participation in the procedures.

A report with the history of the supplier's participation in procurements that includes:
items: Register of procurements in which the supplier participated.

cardLink.title: A unified tool
cardLink.description: A universal analytical tool that allows you to get complete information about suppliers

cardBottom.title: Amount of data
cardBottom.text: The system uses digital profiles of more than 800000 procurement participants

cardBottom.title: Quality of sources
cardBottom.text: More than 50 regularly updated data sources

cardBottom.title: Simplicity of operation
cardBottom.text: It is enough to set the necessary parameters in our service, and you will receive the necessary report online

cardBottom.title: Data relevance
cardBottom.text: The accuracy of the selection tends to be 100% due to the availability of retrospective data

cardBottom.title: Cost of the report
cardBottom.text: The functionality is free for the Organizers working at the TEK-Torg platform

items.text:
Get accreditation on the platform.
If you are not yet a client of TEK-Torg JSC, register for the section, or contact the manager for consultation: org223@tektorg.ru, +7 495 734-81-18 ext. 515

Go to your personal account.
In your personal account on the section "223-FZ and Commercial procurement", go to the section "Digital Assistant"

Select service.
Select the necessary service and get the information you are interested in

Go to your personal account.
In your personal account on the section "223-FZ and Commercial procurement", go to the section "Digital Assistant"

Select service.
Select the necessary service and get the information you are interested in

bannerText.title: Unloading of tender specialists
text: All services are available within a unified workspace, allowing to free specialists of procurement and tender departments from routine work on finding information about suppliers
